skills.name: Flower of Torpedo Squadron 2 (二水戦の華)
text:
When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Jintsuu's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
If Sendai is in the same battle, increases all of Jintsuu's damage by 20%.

skills.name: Bounce Back (奮起)
text: During battle, if a target is sunk by an attack that Jintsuu participate in, reduces Fatigue by 20% and increases Jintsuu's damage by 15% for 15 seconds.
